content: repeat from* __ 32 sts remain knit 3 row decrease round 5 *k2 k2tog repeat from* __24 sts remain knit 2 row decrease round 6 *k1 k2tog repeat from* __16 sts remain knit 1 row decrease round 7 *k2 decrease repeat from * __ 8 sts remain cut yarn and thread the tail into a tapestry needle draw tail through remaining stitches and pull up snugly to close end of toe weave in loose ends
